title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.6 - Treatment of inmates by employees prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.6 - Treatment of inmates by employees prohibited

State Regulations

No employee other than an institutional physician, or a
licensed or certified health practitioner acting within the scope of his
employment and under the direction of a physician, shall diagnose any illness, ailment or injury of any inmate, or prescribe or administer any treatment or
medicine, except in the case of an emergency requiring first aid, which shall
in such emergency be administered as expeditiously as possible by any qualified
person present. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
52.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
